content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Hello Emilia,

I am proposing 1000 Euro for the rental price. Remember, this is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It is close to all important facilities such as supermarket and public transportation.

Remember, if you want to accept the rental price proposed, respond with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!'. If you don't want to continue the negotiation, let me know the reason. If we agree on a price, I will respond with 'TERMINATE'.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
